content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0), offshore pump(position x=106.5, y=-32.5) and pipe group connecting them.

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0) and burner inserter (position x=60.5, y=-61.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=61.5, y=-61.5) and wooden chest (position x=62.5, y=-61.5)

### Pipe network
Consists of pipe group (fluid_system=145301, fluid=steam) and pipe group (fluid_system=145302, fluid=water)

### Electricity network
Consists of electricity group (id=577388, poles=[(x=111.5,y=-27.5),(x=111.5,y=-30.5),(x=112.5,y=-24.5)]) and electricity group (id=577390, poles=[(x=120.5,y=-26.5)])

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when inserting items
-  Make sure to have the required item in the inventory before attempting to insert it into an entity.

### Errors when using insert_item function
-  Ensure the entity has the capacity to hold the item being inserted.

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
-  Important variables:
  -  `transport-belt`: 8
  -  `burner-inserter`: 1
  -  `small-electric-pole`: 8
  -  `pipe`: 13
  -  `stone-furnace`: 1
  -  `wood`: 2
  -  `coal`: 50
  -  `iron-ore`: 4
  -  `copper-ore`: 20
  -  `iron-plate`: 613
  -  `copper-plate`: 1
  -  `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
